title: "executive" typeface
content:
Hey guys. I know I’ve seen this typeface before but I just can’t put my finger on what it is. Any chance I could get some help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080528043627im_/http:/typophile.com/files/efc_font_4907.jpg)

 [‹ A whole lot of numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20080528043627/http:/typophile.com/node/45274 "Go to previous forum topic") [Modern sans serif : Font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080528043627/http:/typophile.com/node/45782 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dpiechnik

comments.content:
university roman is very very nasty, look here for why:

[http://www.stefilara.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080528043627/http:/www.stefilara.com/ "http://www.stefilara.com/")

I find there’s such a lack of consistency between the letterforms that the whole thing ends up looking more like a ransom note than a piece of text.

There are many versions of this typeface.  
The free ones are horrible. Very uneven and looks like they were designed in a rush.  
However you can find it on most font sites, [www.fontshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080528043627/http:/www.fontshop.com/ "www.fontshop.com") for example

JonOhana
